-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A streaming serialization library on top of "pipes" and "cereal-plus"
--   
--   A streaming serialization library on top of <a>pipes</a> and
--   <a>cereal-plus</a>
@package pipes-cereal-plus
@version 0.4.0

module PipesCerealPlus
serializingProducer :: (Monad m, Applicative m, Serializable m a) => a -> Producer ByteString m ()
deserializingPipe :: (Monad m, Applicative m, Serializable m a) => Pipe ByteString a (EitherT Text m) ()

-- | Support for serialization of a data type in a monadic context (e.g.,
--   <a>IO</a>, <a>ST</a>, <a>STM</a>, <a>Identity</a>), meaning that this
--   can be used to provide serialization support for mutable data.
--   
--   To use it in a pure context, refer to <a>Identity</a> monad.
class Serializable (m :: * -> *) a
serialize :: Serializable m a => a -> Serialize m ()
deserialize :: Serializable m a => Deserialize m a

-- | A serialization monad transformer.
data Serialize (m :: * -> *) a :: (* -> *) -> * -> *

-- | A deserialization monad transformer.
data Deserialize (m :: * -> *) a :: (* -> *) -> * -> *
